projects.name: ModaBella
descriptions: This is a single-paged e-commerce website where you can buy any fashion dress for man, woman, and children.

This is a single paged e-commerce website where you can buy fashionable dresses for men, women, and children. All products are divided into different categories so customers can go to what they need in one click. After registering and login as a customer one can buy the products using a stripe payment system. After successful payment, they can see all the parched products and all the payment history with transaction ids. The three roles of this site are admin, seller, and customer. An admin can manage all the products on the site and make any registered user into an admin or seller. After being a seller one can add his product for sale. Only if an admin approves the product, it will display on the website. Used animation libraries in the front end.

projects.name: AdmissionGuru
descriptions: This is a single-page educational website where students can find the best colleges for them.

This is a single-page educational website where students can find the best colleges for them. The students can browse all colleges on the website and they can search a college by college name. They can see all the details on the college details page. There is a page where students can book a seat at their favorite college and can see the college afterward. The website has many features such as after login or registration. Some pages are protected by privet routes. After registering and login to an account one can get full access to the website. If not, they will redirect to the login page. Students can see all their detailed information on the profile page. And always can edit all the profile information.

projects.name: Champions Sports Camp
descriptions: This is a single-paged summer sports camp website where you can enroll some of best sports courses you can find.

This is a single-page summer sports camp website. All the students, instructors and admin can use this website with different roles. Different users have different dashboards on this website. After successfully registering and login everyone is a student by default. An admin can make a user instructor and even an admin. He can approve or deny any classes added by the instructors. He can send feedback to explain the denial of that class. Only the instructor can see this feedback in his dashboard. An instructor can see all the classes he added to this website with the live status of the class and all the feedback written by the admin. He can keep adding new courses as many as he wants. If the admin approves these classes then it will show on the website.Students can enroll in a class by purchasing a class. They can pay with any valid card.

projects.name: Hero Dungeon
descriptions: This is a single-paged online toy store website where you will find all action figure toys from Marvel, Avengers, and Transformers Universe.

This is a single-page action figure toy store website where you can find all the toys of the characters from Marvel, avengers, and Transformers. The website has many features such as after login or registration. Some pages are protected by privet routes. To gain full access one must log in or register an account. Users can add a toy, which will be shown in the main section of the website. And he/she will have complete control of editing or deleting the toy from the database.

projects.name: BD Chefs Knife
descriptions: This is a single-paged website where you can find some mouthwatering recipes of Bangladeshi chefs.

This is a light theme website that contains the recipe of the most brilliant chefs of Bangladesh. After login user can see the most popular recipes of the best chefs. There are a lot of mouthwatering recipes that a person can't resist. Users can also mark a dish as their favorite by clicking the favorite button. He or she can buy that dish or order them later. For user security, login and registration pages are given so users can visit the website safely and freely. The website has privet routes to limit some access from un-logged-in users. To get full access of the website, one must login or register to the website.
